#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld",&a);
#define ll long long


using namespace std;
string s1,s2;
ll dp[1005][1005]={{0}};

int main()
{
	ll i,z,t,p,q,j;
	sl(t)
	for(z=1;z<=t;z++)
	{
		sl(p)
		sl(q)
		cin>>s1;
		cin>>s2;
		for(i=1;i<=p;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=q;j++)
			{
				if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1])
				{
					dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1]+1;
				}
				else
				{
					dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);
				}
			}
		}
		printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",z,p+q-dp[p][q]);
	}
	return 0;
}
